statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT player_id, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_transactions > 3 ORDER BY num_transactions ASC, player_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT purchase_id FROM purchases WHERE player_id = 100);
SELECT player_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_purchase_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM player JOIN purchase ON player.player_id = purchase.player_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, sum(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM player JOIN transaction ON player.player_id = transaction.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase FROM purchase JOIN player ON player.player_id = purchase.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_email = 'example@email.com'
SELECT * FROM purchase WHERE purchase_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_name, purchase_amount FROM player p JOIN purchase pu ON p.player_id = pu.player_id
SELECT player_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM player p JOIN purchase pu ON p.player_id = pu.player_id GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY total_purchase DESC
SELECT player_name, transaction_amount FROM player p JOIN transaction t ON p.player_id = t.player_id
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_balance FROM players WHERE player_balance > 1000;
SELECT item_name, item_cost FROM purchases WHERE item_cost < 50.00 ORDER BY item_cost ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE item_cost > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, item_name FROM purchases JOIN players ON purchases.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_balance < 500 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE item_quantity > 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_purchases > 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT item_name, price FROM items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT player_name, purchase_date, amount FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = '1234';
SELECT item_name, price FROM items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT player_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM players JOIN purchases ON players.player_id = purchases.player_id GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT player_name, transaction_date, amount, type FROM players JOIN transactions ON players.player_id = transactions.player_id WHERE type = 'purchase';
